          Apply To Be a Campus Safety Escort Services Student Coordinator
         
 Apply to be a CSES student coordinator within the Women’s Resource Center at UCR. This paid position is part-time and helps to ensure the safety of UCR’s students, faculty, and staff as they head to on-campus destinations. 
 As a student coordinator, you will: 
 • Supervise volunteer safety escorts, dispatchers, and cart drivers. 
 • Plan and publicize public events. 
 • Create promotional materials and new programs. 
 • And so much more! 
 Apply by June 11!   https://ucr.joinhandshake.com/jobs/4837054/share_preview   
 
 
 
  Friday, June 11
           
 
  Virtual Event
